```{r}

```


```{r}
df = read.csv("/Users/thorkildkappel/Desktop/4. sem/Soc cult-paper/archive/train_v4_drcat_01.csv")
```



```{r}
words = df %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, text) %>%
  count(label, word, sort = TRUE)


```


```{r}
total_words <- words %>% group_by(label) %>% summarize(total = sum(n))
words <- left_join(words, total_words)
```


```{r}
words <- words %>%
  bind_tf_idf(word, label, n)
words
```

```{r}
words %>%
  select(-total) %>%
  arrange(desc(tf_idf))
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data = words, aes(word,))
  geom_histogram()
```
